page.title: 06POPULATION AROUND LIDLINGTON
page.content:
POPULATIONS ARE APPROX;LIDLINGTON 1140,BROGBOROUGH 310.IN 1984/5 THERE WERE 14 BIRTHS AND 16 DEATHS.
DOCTORS CERTIFY DEATH.UNDERTAKERS ARE PRIVATE FIRMS,THEY TAKE CARE OF THE BODY AND RELATIVES CAN SEE THEM IN THE CHAPEL OF REST,BEFORE THE FUNERAL. BODIES OR ASHES CAN BE BURIED IN THE VILLAGE GRAVEYARD.CREMATIONS TAKE PLACE IN BEDFORD.
GOVERNMENT CONTROLLED CENSUSES OCCUR EVERY 10 YEARS AND MINI CENSUSES EVERY 5 YEARS.THE AIM IS TO FIND TOTAL STATISTICAL POPULATION TO ASSESS INCREASE OR DECREASE IN POPULATION,TO TRY TO DETERMINE WHAT AMENITIES WILL BE NEEDED IN THE FUTURE.
